SqlDefinition.SqlCommand: UPDATE b_appointment_consultation SET Update_Time=NOW() <%=,Company=@@Company@@%> <%=,Contacts=@@Contacts@@%> <%=,Phone=@@Phone@@%> <%=,Email=@@Email@@%> <%=,Matter=@@Matter@@%> <%=,Material=@@Material@@%> <%=,AC_Status=@@AC_Status@@%> <%=,Processing_Result=@@Processing_Result@@%><%=,Update_UserId=@@Update_UserId@@%> <%=,Update_User=@@Update_User@@%> WHERE AC_ID=@@AC_ID@@;

SELECT AC_ID,Company,Contacts,Phone,Email,Matter,Material,AC_Status,Processing_Result,Create_Time,Create_UserId,Create_User,Update_Time,Update_UserId,Update_User FROM b_appointment_consultation WHERE 1=1 <%= AND AC_ID=@@AC_ID@@%> <%= AND Company=@@Company@@%> <%= AND Contacts=@@Contacts@@%> <%= AND Phone=@@Phone@@%> <%= AND Email=@@Email@@%> <%= AND Matter=@@Matter@@%> <%= AND Material=@@Material@@%> <%= AND AC_Status=@@AC_Status@@%> <%= AND Processing_Result=@@Processing_Result@@%> ORDER BY AC_Status,AC_ID <R%= LIMIT @@StartIndex@@, @@SelectCount@@ %R> ; SELECT COUNT(0) AS row_count FROM b_appointment_consultation WHERE 1=1 <%= AND AC_ID=@@AC_ID@@%> <%= AND Company=@@Company@@%> <%= AND Contacts=@@Contacts@@%> <%= AND Phone=@@Phone@@%> <%= AND Email=@@Email@@%> <%= AND Matter=@@Matter@@%> <%= AND Material=@@Material@@%> <%= AND AC_Status=@@AC_Status@@%> <%= AND Processing_Result=@@Processing_Result@@%> ;
